title: Customer Page
instructions_content:
1. To add a new customer, fill in the form and press 'Save'.
2. To update an existing customer, select a customer from the list, modify the details, and press 'Update'.
3. To delete a customer, press the delete icon next to the customer's name and confirm the deletion.
4. In landscape mode, the customer list is displayed on the left and details on the right. In portrait mode, the details are shown after selecting a customer.
delete_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this customer?
reservation_instructions_content: Use this page to add and manage reservations.
delete_plane_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this airplane?
instructions_planeContent:
1. To add a new airplane, fill in the form and press 'Submit'.
2. To update an existing airplane, select an airplane from the list, modify the details, and press 'Update'.
3. To delete an airplane, select an airplane from the list and press the delete button below the selected airplane details.
4. In landscape mode, the airplane list is displayed on the left and details on the right. In portrait mode, the details are shown after selecting an airplane.
